last_episode_to_air.name: Every Witch Way But Loose
last_episode_to_air.overview: The origin of the magic veil and the Te Xuan Ze is revealed, Auntie Roon returns for a second time and plans to enslave humanity by turning June into a monster and breaking the Magical Touchstones. Jody becomes suspicious of June and Magic as Ray-Ray, Monroe, Dennis, and Lila try to prevent Auntie Roon from succeeding.The Final Episode

name: The Life and Times of Juniper Lee
original_name: The Life and Times of Juniper Lee
overview: The Life and Times of Juniper Lee is an American animated television series, created by Judd Winick and produced by Cartoon Network Studios. It premiered on Cartoon Network on May 30, 2005, and ended its run on April 9, 2007.

episodes.name: It's Your Party and I'll Whine if I Want To
episodes.overview: June has been doing her te Xuan Ze thing for just over a month and it's become a real hassle.  She's managed to flake out on her friends on a regular basis and has managed to acquire a reputation for being weird.  And now, one of her best friends, Jody, is having a birthday party.  June of course gets called away because the Leprechauns have let loose the Racatan.  Despite begging Ah mah to help out, June is forced to skip the party and save Orchid Bay City again.

episodes.name: I've Got My Mind on My Mummy and My Mummy on My Mind
episodes.overview: June has to stop a mummy who opened up his own restaurant.

episodes.name: It Takes a Pillage
episodes.overview: The spirits of Nordic Vikings take possession of June's friends and it's up to her, Monroe,and RayRay to get them back to normal.

episodes.name: New Trickster in Town
episodes.overview: June battles Loki, the god of pranks and lies.

episodes.name: Not in My Backyard
episodes.overview: June and Ray-Ray baby-sit a migrating Batoot.

episodes.name: Enter Sandman
episodes.overview: June tries out for the school talent show. But she must put her efforts on hold when everyone in the city falls asleep and they become victims of a plot by the Sandman, lord of the sleep realm.

episodes.name: Ding Dong the Witch Ain't Dead
episodes.overview: Many years ago, there once was an evil witch named Auntie Roon who battled the Te Xuan Ze of that time. She was defeated and also banished at the same time. Many years later, a 10th level Warlock has gotten together with a Pus Goblin and an Antelope Snake to release Auntie Roon where the sacred grounds are where the Orchid Bay Mall now stands. At the same time, June, Jody, Ophelia, and Roger try to get in line to get the latest album from the band called Ambiguous Angst. When Auntie Roon is released, she lifts the veil that was preventing the humans from seeing monsters and has her minions gather every teen and kid in one spot. How will June defeat Auntie Roon?

episodes.name: I'll Get By with a Little Help from My Elf
episodes.overview: June becomes so busy with her duties as Te Xuan Ze that she asks for some assistance in clearing her schedule from a helper elf who is Local 492. But he ends up causing more trouble than he's worth. How can she get her job as the Te Xuan Ze done and finish her serious grounding matters at once?

episodes.name: The World According to L.A.R.P.
episodes.overview: Maret, Grand Arch-Demon of the 6th Astral Plane, accidentally kidnaps Dennis.

episodes.name: Magic Takes a Holiday
episodes.overview: June goes to performing arts camp on Edipan.

episodes.name: Take My Life, Please
episodes.overview: The good 4th-degree sorceress named Ashley arrives in town while pursuing the Baguano. She volunteers to take over June's responsibilities as a bulwark against the forces of evil. June is tempted to let her. June tries to act normal and everything goes wrong. What will happen next after Ashley accidentally feeds a Fustertroll a cookie?

episodes.name: Meet the Parent
episodes.overview: Monroe's father, William, comes to visit.

episodes.name: Monster Con
episodes.overview: The three-day magic convention called "The Convergence" has opened in town and June attends it. All monsters go there to hear her speak. But when an evil organization of bloodthirsty terrorists named H.A.M.(Humans from the Abolishment of Magic) breaks into the convention center and holds everybody there hostage for kidnapping, Ah-Mah is forced out of retirement to save the day.

episodes.name: It's the Great Pumpkin, Juniper Lee
episodes.overview: Every Halloween all monsters become humans for the night; but a monster called Mark has contracted an agent demon, Vikki Devyne, for make him human forever. Thanks to Vikki Devyne, all the now human monster children are unable to change back into monsters, and the parents turn to June to help. However, she has to make deals from getting a protein shake to wrestling a demon that goes by the name of "Jordan The Destroyer" managed by a Don King-hairdo styled wrestling promoter before midnight, or else they will not turn back into monsters and remain human permenantly. Will June do this in the nick of time?

episodes.name: Oh Brother, What Art Thou?
episodes.overview: Ray Ray drinks the growth potion and gradually starts to become a humongus dinosaur-like creature.

episodes.name: The Great Escape
episodes.overview: June tries to help a group of magical demons trapped in the form of zoo animals from a wicked zookeeper who is really a demon named Gigi who drains magical energy from magical folk to stay young. When Gigi turns June into a ring-tailed lemur, how will she escape?

episodes.name: Picture Day
episodes.overview: June and her friends are cloned by an evil demoness who plans to use June's powers to release her father Cordath the Conqueror from the magical banishment.

episodes.name: Star Quality
episodes.overview: June finds herself casted as the star of a reality TV show by the demon producer Jonathan and his assistant Michael.

episodes.name: There's No Mitzvah Like Snow Mitzvah
episodes.overview: A demon named Jean-Claude traps June, her friends, and family within a snow globe during the "Bat Mitzvah" of Jody's sister Rachel.

episodes.name: Bada Bing, Bada Boomfist
episodes.overview: Magic brings Ray Ray's comic book hero, Boomfist, and his evil nemesis to life for an epic clash in Orchid Bay.

episodes.name: Adventures in Babysitting
episodes.overview: After preventing a goblin from aquiring a magic stone, Ah-Mah narrates the story to June how Ray Ray earned the ability to see the magic before she retired. Also, in the flashback, three demons plot to use the Staff of Elusidation to find out which one of Ah-Mah's grandkids has the magic ability of the Te Xuan Ze and drain it from him. Monroe must watch over and protect the children while Ah-Mah fights some Fire Demons. What will happen then?

episodes.name: June's Egg-cellent Adventure: Juniper Lee Meets the Easter Bunny
episodes.overview: June, Ray Ray, and Monroe are sent by a pair of Easter Bunnies to Sweetland to intervine in an feud between the bunnies and the chickens, the latter of which are being led by Monroe's father, William who see this as a game.  Can monroe keep his cool and stop the war?

episodes.name: I've Got You Under My Skin
episodes.overview: June needs to create a double to take Ah-Mah's place at a monster treaty negotiation and not skip school. But as RayRay gets involved in the magic the chaos begins.

episodes.name: Welcome Bat Otter
episodes.overview: Monsters are scared for this menace and June can't to do something against it, now the only hope is the anti bat otter kit sold by Skeeter Khommen-Ghetit.

episodes.name: Dog Show Afternoon
episodes.overview: June is ready to go to California, but when the elves free a Bombat, she must capture it in less of 6 hours or she'll lose her plane.

episodes.name: Dream Date
episodes.overview: The School Dance is the Friday Night, and June is waiting Marcus to invite her, but that's the day when Steven the Sandman is planning to return to Dream land during the dance.

episodes.name: Party Monsters
episodes.overview: It's Ah-Mah's birthday, and the entire Lee family is here to celebrate it including monster friends of Ah-Mah, but things become weird when a crystal sphere begins to transform all the members of Lee family into monsters.

episodes.name: Who's Your Daddy?
episodes.overview: Marcus gets jealous of the new boy Taylor Evermore who likes June. Unfortunately, Taylor is the son of Loki who seeks to escape from the Netherworld and traps June in his place.

episodes.name: Water We Fighting For?
episodes.overview: The magical water is being stolen from Orchid Bay by a water bottle company, so June goes to Aqualandia to find it's king named Agatorius and set things right. Meanwhile, a protest goes around to protect the "Burping Snails."

episodes.name: Feets Too Big
episodes.overview: A Bigfoot captures June and Roger's parents, and Dennis, during a camping trip. June ends up befriending the only female Bigfoot in order to find them.

episodes.name: Citizen June
episodes.overview: As Lila adjusts to human life, June and Jody runs against Melissa O'Malley for class president. After an ad by Melissa, Jody drops out and persuades June to run for class president while she's the manager. Unfortunately, her school comes under extreme peril when Thor appears to pursue a Vindolf Hobgoblin that is hiding in the school. Now June might catch the Vindolf Hobgoblin before Thor destroys the school.

episodes.name: Make Me Up Before You Go-Go
episodes.overview: With Lila still fitting in, Jody invites June and co over to watch a comet. Unfortunately, Rachel ends up sponsoring the slumber party after she breaks up with her boyfriend. During the slumber party, an inter-dimensional transport carrying a Monotuke appears to place Arachnoid Locator Stones to bring down the Adumian Prison Orb containing Unglian Banticores from the Ninth Cycle.

episodes.name: Out of the Past
episodes.overview: Ah-Mah trains June how to use the Staff of Wushu. When thieves working for a demon company called DaPheetes invade, they use a powerful spell made from Dragon Snot and steal the Kanji Statue of a rogue Te Xuan Zee named Kai Yee who turned against the Magical Elders and was imprisoned as a statue. When he steals the Sword of the Elders, June persuades Ah-Mah to let her help. What will be the outcome of this fight?

episodes.name: Sealed With a Fist
episodes.overview: To prevent hmself from getting dethroned by his friends, Dennis finds Juniper's "Animation of the Inanimations" book and accidentally brings the Legion of Villainous Evildoers from the Boomfist comics to life whom attack Orchid Bay. As Dennis tries to make up for what happened, Ray Ray calls Boomfist to help out. Will it be enough to stop L.O.V.E.?

episodes.name: Little Big Mah
episodes.overview: While trying to get to an Ascension Ceremony where June is getting promoted to Kanji, Ah-Mah is getting younger after fighting a Darnock Demon which plans to steal the power of the Elders.

episodes.name: Te Xuan Me?
episodes.overview: When Juniper is missing, Ray Ray takes it upon himself to go find her and save the world.

episodes.name: Food For Naught
episodes.overview: June investigates as the monsters in Orchid Bay City become fierce beasts. When she discovers that the source of this is in the Runey Stix snack food, she tries to persuade Margie and Eloise to stop adding the Tarabok Weed in them. Will she succeed?

episodes.name: A Helping H.A.M.
episodes.overview: June ignores Monroe's advice during a battle against Glimmer Monster. Later, the H.A.M. organization hires a monster named Gorp to capture June, but accidentally kidnaps Monroe. Monroe ends up helping them in their battle against the magic world. What will happen?

episodes.name: The Kids Stay in the Picture
episodes.overview: Ophelia enlists the help of June and Co. into helping her finish her school film. Meanwhile, Cordoth's Daughter plots to bring 500 kids into the Realm of Barandom so she and her father can be free again. With Ray Ray captured, June ends up trapped in the movie. Ray Ray and Monroe must get June out of the movie so that she can finish Ophelia's movie and defeat Cordoth's Daughter.

episodes.name: Every Witch Way But Loose
episodes.overview: The origin of the magic veil and the Te Xuan Ze is revealed, Auntie Roon returns for a second time and plans to enslave humanity by turning June into a monster and breaking the Magical Touchstones. Jody becomes suspicious of June and Magic as Ray-Ray, Monroe, Dennis, and Lila try to prevent Auntie Roon from succeeding.The Final Episode
